channel.title: Python on PSWAPNEET.com
channel.description: Recent content in Python on PSWAPNEET.com

item.title: Python Speech to Text using OpenAI API, Gradio, and PyAutoGUI
item.description: Here are the steps to install the Speech to Text Python program: Make sure that you have Python3 and pip installed on your system. Visit https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys and make an API Key if you do not have one. Note that you have to activate a payment method too because the API is not free, although it is reasonably priced (1hr of transcription will cost you $0.36 at the moment of writing this.
